Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The 22nd sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.The Mao quotation reads "We are now in a new and great era of world revolution. The revolutionary storms in Asia, Africa, and Latin America will definitely deal a decisive and devastating blow to the entire world. The great victory of the Vietnamese people's war to resist the United States and save the country is a powerful proof. The proletariat and working people of Europe, North America and Oceania are in the midst of a new awakening. American nationalism and all other pests have prepared their own gravediggers, and they will be buried before long."
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
